author: Z.B. Steele
description:
2025 was a year full of movies & T.V. featuring the grim and the dark, the bloody and the bold, and the glorious and the maimed. Our team had a hell of a year enjoying all things gritty, and this list is sure to delight any grimdark fans who are looking for some onscreen dark […]

The post The Best On-Screen Fantasy, Horror, and Sci-Fi entires of 2025 appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: The Best On-Screen Fantasy, Horror, and Sci-Fi entires of 2025
